titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow individuals to designate all or any portion of their income tax refund to reduce the public debt.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 1/5/1993--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow individual taxpayers to designate on their tax returns a portion of any overpayment (not less than one dollar) to reduce the public debt.
